title: KL Recycling Mobile App
shortDescription: Cross-platform Flutter application for comprehensive recycling management with Firebase backend
challenge: Developing a comprehensive recycling management app that works across mobile platforms, integrates with Firebase for data synchronization, handles camera functionality for material identification, and provides offline capabilities for field operations.
solution: Built a cross-platform Flutter app with Firebase backend integration, implementing camera functionality for material scanning, offline data synchronization, push notifications, and comprehensive state management using Provider pattern.

metrics.label: Platform Support
metrics.description: Android, iOS, Web, Windows, macOS, Linux
